entry.description: Minimum permitted dose (in Gy) to Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is TARGET.

entry.name: >Target Prescription Dose
entry.description: Prescribed dose (in Gy) to Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is TARGET.

entry.name: >Target Maximum Dose
entry.description: Maximum permitted dose (in Gy) to Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is TARGET.

entry.name: >Target Underdose Volume Fraction
entry.description: Maximum permitted fraction (in percent) of Target to receive less than the Target Prescription Dose if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is TARGET and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) is VOLUME. See C.8.8.10.1.

entry.name: >Organ at Risk Full-volume Dose
entry.description: Maximum dose (in Gy) to entire Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) is VOLUME.

entry.name: >Organ at Risk Limit Dose
entry.description: Maximum permitted dose (in Gy) to any part of Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) is VOLUME.

entry.name: >Organ at Risk Maximum Dose
entry.description: Maximum dose (in Gy) to non-overdosed part of Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) is VOLUME.

entry.name: >Organ at Risk Overdose Volume Fraction
entry.description: Maximum permitted fraction (in percent) of the Organ at Risk to receive more than the Organ at Risk Maximum Dose if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) is VOLUME.

entry.name: Tolerance Table Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of tolerance tables to be used for delivery of treatment plan. One or more items may be included in this sequence. See Note 1.

entry.name: >Tolerance Table Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Tolerance Table. The value of Tolerance Table Number (300A,0042) shall be unique within the RT Plan in which it is created. Required if Tolerance Table Sequence (300A,0040) is sent.

entry.name: >Tolerance Table Label
entry.description: User-defined label for Tolerance Table.

entry.name: >Gantry Angle Tolerance
entry.description: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Gantry Angle.

entry.name: >Gantry Pitch Angle Tolerance
entry.description: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Gantry Pitch Angle.

entry.name: >Beam Limiting Device Angle Tolerance
entry.description: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Beam Limiting Device Angle.

entry.name: >Beam Limiting Device Tolerance Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) tolerances. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>RT Beam Limiting Device Type
entry.description: Type of beam limiting device (collimator). Required if Beam Limiting Device Tolerance Sequence (300A,0048) is sent. Enumerated Values: X = symmetric jaw pair in IEC X direction Y = symmetric jaw pair in IEC Y direction ASYMX = asymmetric jaw pair in IEC X direction ASYMY = asymmetric pair in IEC Y direction MLCX = multileaf (multi-element) jaw pair in IEC X direction MLCY = multileaf (multi-element) jaw pair in IEC Y direction

entry.name: >>Beam Limiting Device Position Tolerance
entry.description: Maximum permitted difference (in mm) between planned and delivered leaf (element) or jaw positions for current beam limiting device (collimator). Required if Beam Limiting Device Tolerance Sequence (300A,0048) is sent.

entry.name: >Patient Support Angle Tolerance
entry.description: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Patient Support Angle.

entry.name: >Table Top Eccentric Angle Tolerance
entry.description: Maximum permitted difference (in degrees) between planned and delivered Table Top Eccentric Angle.

entry.name: >Table Top Vertical Position Tolerance
entry.description: Maximum permitted difference (in mm) between planned and delivered Table Top Vertical Position.

entry.name: >Table Top Longitudinal Position Tolerance
entry.description: Maximum permitted difference (in mm) between planned and delivered Table Top Longitudinal Position.

entry.name: >Table Top Lateral Position Tolerance
entry.description: Maximum permitted difference (in mm) between planned and delivered Table Top Lateral Position.

entry.name: Patient Setup Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of patient setup data for current plan. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >Patient Setup Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Patient Setup. The value of Patient Setup Number (300A,0182) shall be unique within the RT Plan in which it is created.

entry.name: >Patient Setup Label
entry.description: The user-defined label for the patient setup.

entry.name: >Patient Position
entry.description: Patient position descriptor relative to the equipment. Required if Patient Additional Position (300A,0184) is not present. See Section C.7.3.1.1.2 for Defined Terms and further explanation.

entry.name: >Patient Additional Position
entry.description: User-defined additional description of patient position. Required if Patient Position (0018,5100) is not present.

entry.name: >Referenced Setup Image Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of setup verification images for this patient setup. One or more items may be included in this sequence. See C.8.8.12.1.1

entry.name: >>Setup Image Comment
entry.description: Comment on the Setup Image.

include.ref: >>Include ‘Image SOP Instance Reference Macro' Table 10-3

entry.name: >Fixation Device Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of Fixation Devices used in Patient Setup. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Fixation Device Type
entry.description: Type of Fixation Device used during in Patient Setup. Required if Fixation Device Sequence (300A,0190) is sent. Defined Terms: BITEBLOCK HEADFRAME MASK MOLD CAST HEADREST BREAST_BOARD BODY_FRAME VACUUM_MOLD WHOLE_BODY_POD RECTAL_BALLOON

entry.name: >>Fixation Device Label
entry.description: User-defined label identifier for Fixation Device. Required if Fixation Device Sequence (300A,0190) is sent.

entry.name: >>Fixation Device Description
entry.description: User-defined description of Fixation Device.

entry.name: >>Fixation Device Position
entry.description: Position/Notch number of Fixation Device.

entry.name: >>Fixation Device Pitch Angle
entry.description: The Fixation Device Pitch Angle, i.e. orientation of PITCHED FIXATION DEVICE coordinate system with respect to IEC PATIENT SUPPORT coordinate system (degrees). Pitching is the rotation around IEC PATIENT SUPPORT X-axis.

entry.name: >>Fixation Device Roll Angle
entry.description: The Fixation Device Roll Angle, i.e. orientation of ROLLED FIXATION DEVICE coordinate system with respect to IEC PITCHED FIXATION DEVICE coordinate system (degrees). Rolling is the rotation around IEC PATIENT SUPPORT Y-axis.

entry.name: >>Accessory Code
entry.description: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

entry.name: >Shielding Device Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of Shielding Devices used in Patient Setup. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Shielding Device Type
entry.description: Type of Shielding Device used in Patient Setup. Required if Shielding Device Sequence (300A,01A0) is sent. Defined Terms: GUM EYE GONAD

entry.name: >>Shielding Device Label
entry.description: User-defined label for Shielding Device. Required if Shielding Device Sequence (300A,01A0) is sent.

entry.name: >>Shielding Device Description
entry.description: User-defined description of Shielding Device.

entry.name: >>Shielding Device Position
entry.description: Position/Notch number of Shielding Device.

entry.name: >>Accessory Code
entry.description: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

entry.name: >Setup Technique
entry.description: Setup Technique used in Patient Setup. Defined Terms: ISOCENTRIC FIXED_SSD TBI BREAST_BRIDGE SKIN_APPOSITION

entry.name: >Setup Technique Description
entry.description: User-defined description of Setup Technique.

entry.name: >Setup Device Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of devices used for patient alignment in Patient Setup. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Setup Device Type
entry.description: Type of Setup Device used for Patient alignment. Required if Setup Device Sequence (300A,01B4) is sent. Defined Terms: LASER_POINTER DISTANCE_METER TABLE_HEIGHT MECHANICAL_PTR ARC

entry.name: >>Setup Device Label
entry.description: User-defined label for Setup Device used for patient alignment. Required if Setup Device Sequence (300A,01B4) is sent.

entry.name: >>Setup Device Description
entry.description: User-defined description for Setup Device used for patient alignment.

entry.name: >>Setup Device Parameter
entry.description: Setup Parameter for Setup Device in appropriate IEC 61217 coordinate system. Units shall be mm for distances and degrees for angles. Required if Setup Device Sequence (300A,011B4) is sent.

entry.name: >>Setup Reference Description
entry.description: User-defined description of Setup Reference used for patient alignment.

entry.name: >Table Top Vertical Setup Displacement
entry.description: Vertical Displacement in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (in mm) relative to initial Setup Position, i.e. vertical offset between patient positioning performed using setup and treatment position.

entry.name: >Table Top Longitudinal Setup Displacement
entry.description: Longitudinal Displacement in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (in mm) relative to initial Setup Position, i.e. longitudinal offset between patient positioning performed using setup and treatment position.

entry.name: >Table Top Lateral Setup Displacement
entry.description: Lateral Displacement in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (in mm) relative to initial Setup Position, i.e. lateral offset between patient positioning performed using setup and treatment position.

entry.name: >Motion Synchronization Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of Motion Synchronization. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Respiratory Motion Compensation Technique
entry.description: Technique applied to reduce respiratory motion artifacts. Defined Terms: NONE BREATH_HOLD REALTIME = image acquisition shorter than respiratory cycle GATING = Prospective gating TRACKING = prospective through-plane or in-plane motion tracking PHASE_ORDERING = prospective phase ordering PHASE_RESCANNING = prospective techniques, such as real-time averaging, diminishing variance and motion adaptive gating RETROSPECTIVE = retrospective gating CORRECTION = retrospective image correction UNKNOWN = technique not known

entry.name: >>Respiratory Signal Source
entry.description: Signal source from which respiratory motion is derived. Defined Terms: NONE BELT NASAL_PROBE CO2_SENSOR NAVIGATOR = MR navigator and organ edge detection MR_PHASE = phase (of center k-space line) ECG = baseline demodulation of the ECG SPIROMETER = Signal derived from flow sensor EXTERNAL_MARKER = Signal determined from external motion surrogate INTERNAL_MARKER = Signal determined from internal motion surrogate IMAGE = Signal derived from an image UNKNOWN = Signal source not known

entry.name: >>Respiratory Motion Compensation Technique Description
entry.description: Description of respiratory motion compensation technique.

entry.name: >>Respiratory Signal Source ID
entry.description: Identifies the device providing the respiratory signal.

entry.name: Fraction Group Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of Fraction Groups in current Fraction Scheme. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >Fraction Group Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Fraction Group. The value of Fraction Group Number (300A,0071) shall be unique within the RT Plan in which it is created.

entry.name: >Fraction Group Description
entry.description: The user defined description for the fraction group.

entry.name: >Referenced Dose Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of related SOP Class/Instance pairs describing related instances of RT Dose (for grids, isodose curves and named/unnamed point doses). One or more items may be included in this sequence. See Note 1.

entry.name: >>Referenced SOP Class UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Class. Required if Referenced Dose Sequence (300C,0080) is sent.

entry.name: >>Referenced SOP Instance UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Instance. Required if Referenced Dose Sequence (300C,0080) is sent.

entry.name: >Referenced Dose Reference Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of Dose References for the current Fraction Group. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Referenced Dose Reference Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies Dose Reference specified by Dose Reference Number (300A,0012) within Dose Reference Sequence (300A,0010) in RT Prescription Module. Required if Referenced Dose Reference Sequence (300C,0050) is sent.

entry.name: >>Constraint Weight
entry.description: Relative importance of satisfying constraint, where high values represent more important constraints.

entry.name: >>Delivery Warning Dose
entry.description: The dose (in Gy) which when reached or exceeded should cause some action to be taken.

entry.name: >>Delivery Maximum Dose
entry.description: The maximum dose (in Gy) which can be delivered to the dose reference.

entry.name: >>Target Minimum Dose
entry.description: Minimum permitted dose (in Gy) to Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is TARGET.

entry.name: >>Target Prescription Dose
entry.description: Prescribed dose (in Gy) to Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is TARGET.

entry.name: >>Target Maximum Dose
entry.description: Maximum permitted dose (in Gy) to Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is TARGET.

entry.name: >>Target Underdose Volume Fraction
entry.description: Maximum permitted fraction (in percent) of Target to receive less than the Target Prescription Dose (300A,0027) if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is TARGET and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) of referenced Dose Reference is VOLUME.

entry.name: >>Organ at Risk Full-volume Dose
entry.description: Maximum dose (in Gy) to entire Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) of referenced Dose Reference is VOLUME.

entry.name: >>Organ at Risk Limit Dose
entry.description: Maximum permitted dose (in Gy) to any part of Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) of referenced Dose Reference is VOLUME.

entry.name: >>Organ at Risk Maximum Dose
entry.description: Maximum dose (in Gy) to non-overdosed part of Dose Reference if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) of referenced Dose Reference is VOLUME.

entry.name: >>Organ at Risk Overdose Volume Fraction
entry.description: Maximum permitted fraction (in percent) of Organ at Risk to receive more than the Organ at Risk Maximum Dose if Dose Reference Type (300A,0020) of referenced Dose Reference is ORGAN_AT_RISK and Dose Reference Structure Type (300A,0014) of referenced Dose Reference is VOLUME.

entry.name: >Number of Fractions Planned
entry.description: Total number of treatments (Fractions) prescribed for current Fraction Group.

entry.name: >Number of Fraction Pattern Digits Per Day
entry.description: Number of digits in Fraction Pattern (300A,007B) used to represent one day. See Note 2.

entry.name: >Repeat Fraction Cycle Length
entry.description: Number of weeks needed to describe treatment pattern. See Note 2.

entry.name: >Fraction Pattern
entry.description: String of 0's (no treatment) and 1's (treatment) describing treatment pattern. Length of string is 7 x Number of Fraction Pattern Digits Per Day x Repeat Fraction Cycle Length. Pattern shall start on a Monday. See Note 2.

entry.name: >Number of Beams
entry.description: Number of Beams in current Fraction Group. If Number of Beams is greater then zero, Number of Brachy Application Setups (300A,00A0) shall equal zero.

entry.name: >Referenced Beam Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of treatment beams in current Fraction Group. Required if Number of Beams (300A,0080) is greater than zero. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Referenced Beam Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies Beam specified by Beam Number (300A,00C0) within Beam Sequence (300A,00B0) in RT Beams Module. Required if Referenced Beam Sequence (300C,0004) is sent.

entry.name: >>Beam Dose Specification Point
entry.description: Coordinates (x,y,z) of point at which Beam Dose is specified in the patient based coordinate system described in C.7.6.2.1.1 (mm). See Note 3.

entry.name: >>Beam Dose
entry.description: Dose (in Gy) at Beam Dose Specification Point (300A,0082) due to current Beam.

entry.name: >>Beam Dose Point Depth
entry.description: The depth (in mm) in the patient along a ray from the source to the dose point specified by the Beam Dose Specification Point (300A,0082).

entry.name: >>Beam Dose Point Equivalent Depth
entry.description: The radiological depth in mm (water-equivalent depth, taking tissue heterogeneity into account) in the patient along a ray from the source to the dose point specified by the Beam Dose Specification Point (300A,0082).

entry.name: >>Beam Dose Point SSD
entry.description: Source to patient surface distance along a ray from the source to the dose point specified by the Beam Dose Specification Point (300A,0082).

entry.name: >>Beam Meterset
entry.description: Machine setting to be delivered for current Beam, specified in Monitor Units (MU) or minutes as defined by Primary Dosimeter Unit (300A,00B3) (in RT Beams Module) for referenced Beam. See Note 4.

entry.name: >Number of Brachy Application Setups
entry.description: Number of Brachy Application Setups in current Fraction Group. If Number of Brachy Application Setups is greater then zero, Number of Beams (300A,0080) shall equal zero.

entry.name: >Referenced Brachy Application Setup Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of treatment Brachy Application Setups in current Fraction Group. Required if Number of Brachy Application Setups (300A,00A0) is greater than zero. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Referenced Brachy Application Setup Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies Brachy Application Setup specified by Brachy Application Setup Number (300A,0234) within Brachy Application Setup Sequence (300A,0230) in RT Brachy Application Setups Module. Required if Referenced Brachy Application Setup Sequence (300C,000A) is sent.

entry.name: >>Brachy Application Setup Dose Specification Point
entry.description: Coordinates (x,y,z) of point in the patient based coordinate system described in C.7.6.2.1.1 at which Brachy Application Setup Dose (300A,00A4) is specified (mm).

entry.name: >>Brachy Application Setup Dose
entry.description: Dose (in Gy) at Brachy Application Setup Dose Specification Point (300A,00A2) due to current Brachy Application Setup.

entry.name: Beam Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of treatment beams for current RT Plan. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >Beam Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Beam. The value of Beam Number (300A,00C0) shall be unique within the RT Plan in which it is created. See Note 1.

entry.name: >Beam Name
entry.description: User-defined name for Beam. See Note 1.

entry.name: >Beam Description
entry.description: User-defined description for Beam. See Note 1.

entry.name: >Beam Type
entry.description: Motion characteristic of Beam. See Note 5. Enumerated Values: STATIC = All Control Point Sequence (300A,0111) attributes remain unchanged between consecutive pairs of control points with changing Cumulative Meterset Weight (300A,0134). DYNAMIC = One or more Control Point Sequence (300A,0111) attributes change between one or more consecutive pairs of control points with changing Cumulative Meterset Weight (300A,0134).

entry.name: >Radiation Type
entry.description: Particle type of Beam. Defined Terms: PHOTON ELECTRON NEUTRON PROTON

entry.name: >High-Dose Technique Type
entry.description: Type of high-dose treatment technique. Defined Terms: NORMAL = Standard treatment TBI = Total Body Irradiation HDR = High Dose Rate Required if treatment technique requires a dose that would normally require overriding of treatment machine safety controls.

entry.name: >Treatment Machine Name
entry.description: User-defined name identifying treatment machine to be used for beam delivery. See Note 2.

entry.name: >Manufacturer
entry.description: Manufacturer of the equipment to be used for beam delivery.

entry.name: >Institution Name
entry.description: Institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for beam delivery.

entry.name: >Institution Address
entry.description: Mailing address of the institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for beam delivery.

entry.name: >Institutional Department Name
entry.description: Department in the institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for beam delivery.

entry.name: >Manufacturer's Model Name
entry.description: Manufacturer's model name of the equipment that is to be used for beam delivery.

entry.name: >Device Serial Number
entry.description: Manufacturer's serial number of the equipment that is to be used for beam delivery.

entry.name: >Primary Dosimeter Unit
entry.description: Measurement unit of machine dosimeter. See C.8.8.14.1. Enumerated Values: MU = Monitor Unit MINUTE = minute

entry.name: >Referenced Tolerance Table Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies Tolerance Table specified by Tolerance Table Number (300A,0042) within Tolerance Table Sequence in RT Tolerance Tables Module. These tolerances are to be used for verification of treatment machine settings.

entry.name: >Source-Axis Distance
entry.description: Radiation source to Gantry rotation axis distance of the equipment that is to be used for beam delivery (mm).

entry.name: >Beam Limiting Device Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) jaw or leaf (element) sets. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>RT Beam Limiting Device Type
entry.description: Type of beam limiting device (collimator). Enumerated Values: X = symmetric jaw pair in IEC X direction Y = symmetric jaw pair in IEC Y direction ASYMX = asymmetric jaw pair in IEC X direction ASYMY = asymmetric pair in IEC Y direction MLCX = multileaf (multi-element) jaw pair in IEC X direction MLCY = multileaf (multi-element) jaw pair in IEC Y direction

entry.name: >>Source to Beam Limiting Device Distance
entry.description: Radiation source to beam limiting device (collimator) distance of the equipment that is to be used for beam delivery (mm).

entry.name: >>Number of Leaf/Jaw Pairs
entry.description: Number of leaf (element) or jaw pairs (equal to 1 for standard beam limiting device jaws).

entry.name: >>Leaf Position Boundaries
entry.description: Boundaries of beam limiting device (collimator) leaves (in mm) in IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate axis appropriate to RT Beam Limiting Device Type (300A,00B8), i.e. X-axis for MLCY, Y-axis for MLCX. Contains N+1 values, where N is the Number of Leaf/Jaw Pairs (300A,00BC), starting from Leaf (Element) Pair 1. Required if Beam Limiting Device Sequence (300A,00B6) is sent and RT Beam Limiting Device Type (300A,00B8) is MLCX or MLCY. See Note 3.

entry.name: >Referenced Patient Setup Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies Patient Setup to be used for current beam, specified by Patient Setup Number (300A,0182) within Patient Setup Sequence of RT Patient Setup Module.

entry.name: >Referenced Reference Image Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of reference images used for validation of current beam. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Referenced SOP Class UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Class. Required if Referenced Reference Image Sequence (300C,0042) is sent.

entry.name: >>Referenced SOP Instance UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Instance. Required if Referenced Reference Image Sequence (300C,0042) is sent.

entry.name: >>Reference Image Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies Reference Image within Referenced Reference Image Sequence (300A,0042). Required if Referenced Reference Image Sequence (300A,0042) is sent.

entry.name: >>Start Cumulative Meterset Weight
entry.description: Cumulative Meterset Weight within current Beam at which image acquisition starts.

entry.name: >>End Cumulative Meterset Weight
entry.description: Cumulative Meterset Weight within current Beam at which image acquisition ends.

entry.name: >Planned Verification Image Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of planned verification images to be acquired during current beam. One or more items may be included in this sequence. See C.8.8.14.2.

entry.name: >>Start Cumulative Meterset Weight
entry.description: Cumulative Meterset Weight within current Beam at which image acquisition will start.

entry.name: >>Meterset Exposure
entry.description: Meterset duration over which image is to be acquired, specified in Monitor units (MU) or minutes as defined by Primary Dosimeter Unit (300A,00B3).

entry.name: >>End Cumulative Meterset Weight
entry.description: Cumulative Meterset Weight within current Beam at which image acquisition will end.

entry.name: >>RT Image Plane
entry.description: Describes whether or not image plane is normal to beam axis. Enumerated Values: NORMAL = image plane normal to beam axis NON_NORMAL = image plane non-normal to beam axis

entry.name: >>X-Ray Image Receptor Angle
entry.description: X-Ray Image Receptor Angle i.e. orientation of IEC X-RAY IMAGE RECEPTOR coordinate system with respect to IEC GANTRY coordinate system (degrees). See C.8.8.14.3.

entry.name: >>RT Image Orientation
entry.description: The direction cosines of the first row and the first column with respect to the IEC X-RAY IMAGE RECEPTOR coordinate system.

entry.name: >>RT Image Position
entry.description: The x and y coordinates (in mm) of the upper left hand corner of the image, in the IEC X-RAY IMAGE RECEPTOR coordinate system. This is the center of the first pixel transmitted.

entry.name: >>RT Image SID
entry.description: Radiation machine source to image plane distance (mm).

entry.name: >>Imaging Device-Specific Acquisition Parameters
entry.description: User-specified device-specific parameters that describe how the imager will acquire the image.

entry.name: >>Referenced Reference Image Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies Reference Image to which planned verification image is related, specified by Reference Image Number (300A,00C8) within Referenced Reference Image Sequence (300A,0042).

entry.name: >Treatment Delivery Type
entry.description: Delivery Type of treatment. Defined Terms: TREATMENT = normal patient treatment OPEN_PORTFILM = portal image acquisition with open field TRMT_PORTFILM = portal image acquisition with treatment port CONTINUATION = continuation of interrupted treatment SETUP = no treatment beam is applied for this RT Beam. To be used for specifying the gantry, couch, and other machine positions where X-ray set-up images or measurements are to be taken

entry.name: >Referenced Dose Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of related SOP Class/Instance pairs describing related instances of RT Dose (for grids, isodose curves, and named/unnamed point doses). One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Referenced SOP Class UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Class. Required if Referenced Dose Sequence (300C,0080) is sent.

entry.name: >>Referenced SOP Instance UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Instance. Required if Referenced Dose Sequence (300C,0080) is sent.

entry.name: >Number of Wedges
entry.description: Number of wedges associated with current Beam.

entry.name: >Wedge Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of treatment wedges. Required if Number of Wedges (300A,00D0) is non-zero. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Wedge Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Wedge. The value of Wedge Number (300A,00D2) shall be unique within the Beam in which it is created. Required if Wedge Sequence (300A,00D1) is sent.

entry.name: >>Wedge Type
entry.description: Type of wedge (if any) defined for Beam. Required if Wedge Sequence (300A,00D1) is sent. Defined Terms: STANDARD = standard (static) wedge DYNAMIC = moving beam limiting device (collimator) jaw simulating wedge MOTORIZED = single wedge which can be removed from beam remotely

entry.name: >>Wedge ID
entry.description: User-supplied identifier for Wedge.

entry.name: >>Accessory Code
entry.description: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

entry.name: >>Wedge Angle
entry.description: Nominal wedge angle (degrees). Required if Wedge Sequence (300A,00D1) is sent.

entry.name: >>Wedge Factor
entry.description: Nominal wedge factor under machine calibration conditions at the beam energy specified by the Nominal Beam Energy (300A,0114) of the first Control Point of the Control Point Sequence (300A,0111). Required if Wedge Sequence (300A,00D1) is sent.

entry.name: >>Wedge Orientation
entry.description: Orientation of wedge, i.e. orientation of IEC WEDGE FILTER coordinate system with respect to IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system (degrees). Required if Wedge Sequence (300A,00D1) is sent.

entry.name: >>Source to Wedge Tray Distance
entry.description: Radiation source to wedge tray attachment edge distance (in mm) for current wedge.

entry.name: >Number of Compensators
entry.description: Number of compensators associated with current Beam.

entry.name: >Total Compensator Tray Factor
entry.description: Compensator Tray transmission factor (between 0 and 1), at the beam energy specified by the Nominal Beam Energy (300A,0114) of the first Control Point of the Control Point Sequence (300A,0111).

entry.name: >Compensator Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of treatment compensators. Required if Number of Compensators (300A,00E0) is non-zero. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Compensator Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Compensator. The value of Compensator Number (300A,00E4) shall be unique within the Beam in which it is created. Required if Number of Compensators (300A,00E0) is non-zero.

entry.name: >>Compensator Type
entry.description: Type of compensator (if any). Defined Terms: STANDARD = physical (static) compensator DYNAMIC = moving Beam Limiting Device (collimator) simulating physical compensator

entry.name: >>Material ID
entry.description: User-supplied identifier for material used to manufacture Compensator. Required if Number of Compensators (300A,00E0) is non-zero.

entry.name: >>Compensator ID
entry.description: User-supplied identifier for compensator.

entry.name: >>Accessory Code
entry.description: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

entry.name: >>Source to Compensator Tray Distance
entry.description: Radiation source to compensator tray attachment edge distance (in mm) for current compensator. Required if Compensator Sequence (300A,00E3) is sent.

entry.name: >>Compensator Divergence
entry.description: Indicates presence or absence of geometrical divergence of the compensator. Enumerated Values: PRESENT = the compensator is shaped according to the beam geometrical divergence. ABSENT = the compensator is not shaped according to the beam geometrical divergence.

entry.name: >>Compensator Mounting Position
entry.description: Indicates on which side of the Compensator Tray the compensator is mounted. Enumerated Values: PATIENT_SIDE = the compensator is mounted on the side of the Compensator Tray which is towards the patient. SOURCE_SIDE = the compensator is mounted on the side of the Compensator Tray which is towards the radiation source. DOUBLE_SIDED = the compensator has a shaped (i.e. non-flat) surface on both sides of the Compensator Tray.

entry.name: >>Compensator Rows
entry.description: Number of rows in the compensator. Required if Compensator Sequence (300A,00E3) is sent.

entry.name: >>Compensator Columns
entry.description: Number of columns in the compensator. Required if Compensator Sequence (300A,00E3) is sent.

entry.name: >>Compensator Pixel Spacing
entry.description: Physical distance (in mm) between the center of each pixel projected onto machine isocentric plane. Specified by a numeric pair - adjacent row spacing (delimiter) adjacent column spacing. See 10.7.1.3 for further explanation of the value order. Required if Compensator Sequence (300A,00E3) is sent.

entry.name: >>Compensator Position
entry.description: The x and y coordinates of the upper left hand corner (first pixel transmitted) of the compensator, projected onto the machine isocentric plane in the IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system (mm). Required if Compensator Sequence (300A,00E3) is sent.

entry.name: >>Compensator Transmission Data
entry.description: A data stream of the pixel samples which comprise the compensator, expressed as broad-beam transmission values (between 0 and 1) along a ray line passing through the pixel, at the beam energy specified by the Nominal Beam Energy (300A,0114) of the first Control Point of the Control Point Sequence (300A,0111). The order of pixels sent is left to right, top to bottom, i.e., the upper left pixel is sent first followed by the remainder of the first row , followed by the first pixel of the 2nd row, then the remainder of the 2nd row and so on) when viewed from the radiation source. Required if Compensator Sequence (300A,00E3) is sent and Material ID (300A,00E1) is zero-length. See C.8.8.14.10. Note: Compensator Transmission Data may not be properly encoded if Explicit-VR transfer syntax is used and the VL of this attribute exceeds 65534 bytes.

entry.name: >>Compensator Thickness Data
entry.description: A data stream of the pixel samples which comprise the compensator, expressed as thicknesses (in mm). The order of pixels sent is left to right, top to bottom, i.e., the upper left pixel is sent first followed by the remainder of the first row , followed by the first pixel of the 2nd row, then the remainder of the 2nd row and so on) when viewed from the radiation source. Required if Compensator Sequence (300A,00E3) is sent and Material ID (300A,00E1) is non-zero length. See C.8.8.14.9 and C.8.8.14.10. Note: Compensator Thickness Data may not be properly encoded if Explicit-VR transfer syntax is used and the VL of this attribute exceeds 65534 bytes.

entry.name: >>Source to Compensator Distance
entry.description: A data stream of the pixel samples which comprise the distance from the radiation source to the compensator surface closest to the radiation source (in mm). The order of pixels sent is left to right, top to bottom (upper left pixel, followed by the remainder of row 1, followed by the remainder of the columns). Required if Compensator Sequence (300A,00E3) is sent, Material ID (300A,00E1) is non-zero length, and Compensator Mounting Position (300A,02E1) is DOUBLE_SIDED. See C.8.8.14.9.

entry.name: >Number of Boli
entry.description: Number of boli associated with current Beam.

entry.name: >Referenced Bolus Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of boli associated with Beam. Required if Number of Boli (300A,00ED) is non-zero. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Referenced ROI Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies ROI representing the Bolus specified by ROI Number (3006,0022) in Structure Set ROI Sequence (3006,0020) in Structure Set Module within RT Structure Set in Referenced Structure Set Sequence (300C,0060) in RT General Plan Module. Required if Referenced Bolus Sequence (300C,00B0) is sent.

entry.name: >>Bolus ID
entry.description: User-supplied identifier for the Bolus.

entry.name: >>Bolus Description
entry.description: User-defined description for the Bolus.

entry.name: >>Accessory Code
entry.description: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

entry.name: >Number of Blocks
entry.description: Number of shielding blocks associated with Beam.

entry.name: >Total Block Tray Factor
entry.description: Total block tray transmission for all block trays (between 0 and 1) at the beam energy specified by the Nominal Beam Energy (300A,0114) of the first Control Point of the Control Point Sequence (300A,0111).

entry.name: >Block Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of blocks associated with Beam. Required if Number of Blocks (300A,00F0) is non-zero. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Block Tray ID
entry.description: User-supplied identifier for block tray.

entry.name: >>Accessory Code
entry.description: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

entry.name: >>Source to Block Tray Distance
entry.description: Radiation Source to attachment edge of block tray assembly (mm). Required if Block Sequence (300A,00F4) is sent.

entry.name: >>Block Type
entry.description: Type of block. Required if Block Sequence (300A,00F4) is sent. See C.8.8.14.4. Enumerated Values: SHIELDING = blocking material is inside contour APERTURE = blocking material is outside contour

entry.name: >>Block Divergence
entry.description: Indicates presence or otherwise of geometrical divergence. Required if Block Sequence (300A,00F4) is sent. Enumerated Values: PRESENT = block edges are shaped for beam divergence ABSENT = block edges are not shaped for beam divergence

entry.name: >>Block Mounting Position
entry.description: Indicates on which side of the Block Tray the block is mounted. Enumerated Values: PATIENT_SIDE = the block is mounted on the side of the Block Tray which is towards the patient. SOURCE_SIDE = the block is mounted on the side of the Block Tray which is towards the radiation source.

entry.name: >>Block Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Block. The value of Block Number (300A,00FC) shall be unique within the Beam in which it is created. Required if Block Sequence (300A,00F4) is sent.

entry.name: >>Block Name
entry.description: User-defined name for block.

entry.name: >>Material ID
entry.description: User-supplied identifier for material used to manufacture Block. Required if Block Sequence (300A,00F4) is sent.

entry.name: >>Block Thickness
entry.description: Physical thickness of block (in mm) parallel to radiation beam axis. Required if Block Sequence (300A,00F4) is sent and Material ID (300A,00E1) is non-zero length. See C.8.8.14.4.

entry.name: >>Block Transmission
entry.description: Transmission through the block (between 0 and 1) at the beam energy specified by the Nominal Beam Energy (300A,0114) of the first Control Point of the Control Point Sequence (300A,0111). Required if Block Sequence (300A,00F4) is sent and Material ID (300A,00E1) is zero length. See C.8.8.14.4.

entry.name: >>Block Number of Points
entry.description: Number of (x,y) pairs defining the block edge. Required if Block Sequence (300A,00F4) is sent.

entry.name: >>Block Data
entry.description: A data stream of (x,y) pairs which comprise the block edge. The number of pairs shall be equal to Block Number of Points (300A,0104), and the vertices shall be interpreted as a closed polygon. Coordinates are projected onto the machine isocentric plane in the IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system (mm). Required if Block Sequence (300A,00F4) is sent. See Note 4.

entry.name: >Applicator Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of Applicators associated with Beam. Only a single item shall be permitted in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Applicator ID
entry.description: User or machine supplied identifier for Applicator. Required if Applicator Sequence (300A,0107) is sent.

entry.name: >>Accessory Code
entry.description: An identifier for the accessory intended to be read by a device such as a bar-code reader.

entry.name: >>Applicator Type
entry.description: Type of Applicator. Required if Applicator Sequence (300A,0107) is sent. Defined Terms: ELECTRON_SQUARE = square electron applicator ELECTRON_RECT = rectangular electron applicator ELECTRON_CIRC = circular electron applicator ELECTRON_SHORT = short electron applicator ELECTRON_OPEN = open (dummy) electron applicator INTRAOPERATIVE = intraoperative (custom) applicator STEREOTACTIC = stereotactic applicator

entry.name: >>Applicator Description
entry.description: User-defined description for Applicator.

entry.name: >Final Cumulative Meterset Weight
entry.description: Value of Cumulative Meterset Weight (300A,0134) for final Control Point in Control Point Sequence (300A,0111). Required if Cumulative Meterset Weight is non-null in Control Points specified within Control Point Sequence (300A,0111). See C.8.8.14.1.

entry.name: >Number of Control Points
entry.description: Number of control points in Beam.

entry.name: >Control Point Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of machine configurations describing treatment beam. Two or more items may be included in this sequence. See C.8.8.14.5 and C.8.8.14.6.

entry.name: >>Control Point Index
entry.description: Index of current Control Point, starting at 0 for first Control Point. Required if Control Point Sequence (300A,0111) is sent.

entry.name: >>Cumulative Meterset Weight
entry.description: Cumulative weight to current control point. Cumulative Meterset Weight for the first item in Control Point Sequence shall always be zero. Cumulative Meterset Weight for the final item in Control Point Sequence shall always be equal to Final Cumulative Meterset Weight. Required if Control Point Sequence (300A,0111) is sent. See C.8.8.14.1.

entry.name: >>Referenced Dose Reference Sequence
entry.description: Introduces a sequence of Dose References for current Beam. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>>Referenced Dose Reference Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies Dose Reference specified by Dose Reference Number (300A,0012) in Dose Reference Sequence (300A,0010) in RT Prescription Module. Required if Referenced Dose Reference Sequence (300C,0050) is sent.

entry.name: >>>Cumulative Dose Reference Coefficient
entry.description: Coefficient used to calculate cumulative dose contribution from this Beam to the referenced Dose Reference at the current Control Point. Required if Referenced Dose Reference Sequence (300C,0050) is sent. See C.8.8.14.7.

entry.name: >>Referenced Dose Sequence
entry.description: Sequence describing related instances of RT Dose (for grids, isodose curves, and named/unnamed point doses). One or more items may be included in this sequence. Required if RT Dose is being sent, and Dose Summation Type (3004,000A) equals CONTROL_POINT.

entry.name: >>>Referenced SOP Class UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Class.

entry.name: >>>Referenced SOP Instance UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Instance.

entry.name: >>Nominal Beam Energy
entry.description: Nominal Beam Energy at control point (MV/MeV).

entry.name: >>Dose Rate Set
entry.description: Dose Rate to be set on treatment machine for segment beginning at current control point (e.g. MU/min).

entry.name: >>Wedge Position Sequence
entry.description: A Sequence of Items describing Wedge Positions for the current control point. Required for first item of Control Point Sequence if Number of Wedges (300A,00D0) is non-zero, and in subsequent control points if Wedge Position (300A,0118) changes during Beam. See C.8.8.14.5. The number of items in this sequence shall equal the value of Number of Wedges (300A,00D0).

entry.name: >>>Referenced Wedge Number
entry.description: Uniquely references Wedge described by Wedge Number (300A,00D2) in Wedge Sequence (300A,00D1). Required if Wedge Position Sequence (300A,0116) is sent.

entry.name: >>>Wedge Position
entry.description: Position of Wedge at current Control Point. Required if Wedge Position Sequence (300A,0116) is sent. Enumerated Values: IN OUT

entry.name: >>Beam Limiting Device Position Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) jaw or leaf (element) positions. Required for first item of Control Point Sequence, or if Beam Limiting Device changes during Beam. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>>RT Beam Limiting Device Type
entry.description: Type of beam limiting device (collimator). The value of this attribute shall correspond to RT Beam Limiting Device Type (300A,00B8) defined in an item of Beam Limiting Device Sequence (300A,00B6). Required if Beam Limiting Device Position Sequence (300A,011A) is sent. Enumerated Values: X = symmetric jaw pair in IEC X direction Y = symmetric jaw pair in IEC Y direction ASYMX = asymmetric jaw pair in IEC X direction ASYMY = asymmetric pair in IEC Y direction MLCX = multileaf (multi-element) jaw pair in IEC X direction MLCY = multileaf (multi-element) jaw pair in IEC Y direction

entry.name: >>>Leaf/Jaw Positions
entry.description: Positions of beam limiting device (collimator) leaf (element) or jaw pairs (in mm) in IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate axis appropriate to RT Beam Limiting Device Type (300A,00B8), e.g. X-axis for MLCX, Y-axis for MLCY. Contains 2N values, where N is the Number of Leaf/Jaw Pairs (300A,00BC) in Beam Limiting Device Sequence (300A,00B6). Values shall be listed in IEC leaf (element) subscript order 101, 102, ... 1N, 201, 202, ... 2N. Required if Beam Limiting Device Position Sequence (300A,011A) is sent. See Note 2.

entry.name: >>Gantry Angle
entry.description: Gantry angle of radiation source, i.e. orientation of IEC GANTRY coordinate system with respect to IEC FIXED REFERENCE coordinate system (degrees). Required for first item of Control Point Sequence, or if Gantry Angle changes during Beam.

entry.name: >>Gantry Rotation Direction
entry.description: Direction of Gantry Rotation when viewing gantry from isocenter, for segment following Control Point. Required for first item of Control Point Sequence, or if Gantry Rotation Direction changes during Beam. See C.8.8.14.8. Enumerated Values: CW = clockwise CC = counter-clockwise NONE = no rotation

entry.name: >>Gantry Pitch Angle
entry.description: Gantry Pitch Angle. i.e. the rotation of the IEC GANTRY coordinate system about the X-axis of the IEC GANTRY coordinate system (degrees). If used, must be present for first item of Control Point Sequence, or if used and Gantry Pitch Rotation Angle changes during Beam, must be present. See C.8.8.25.6.5.

entry.name: >>Gantry Pitch Rotation Direction
entry.description: Direction of Gantry Pitch Angle when viewing along the positive X-axis of the IEC GANTRY coordinate system, for segment following Control Point. If used, must be present for first item of Control Point Sequence, or if used and Gantry Pitch Rotation Direction changes during Beam, must be present. See C.8.8.14.8 and C.8.8.25.6.5. Enumerated Values: CW = clockwise CC = counter-clockwise NONE = no rotation

entry.name: >>Beam Limiting Device Angle
entry.description: Beam Limiting Device angle, i.e. orientation of IEC BEAM LIMITING DEVICE coordinate system with respect to IEC GANTRY coordinate system (degrees). Required for first item of Control Point Sequence, or if Beam Limiting Device Angle changes during Beam.

entry.name: >>Beam Limiting Device Rotation Direction
entry.description: Direction of Beam Limiting Device Rotation when viewing beam limiting device (collimator) from radiation source, for segment following Control Point. Required for first item of Control Point Sequence, or if Beam Limiting Device Rotation Direction changes during Beam. See C.8.8.14.8. Enumerated Values: CW = clockwise CC = counter-clockwise NONE = no rotation

entry.name: >>Patient Support Angle
entry.description: Patient Support angle, i.e. orientation of IEC PATIENT SUPPORT (turntable) coordinate system with respect to IEC FIXED REFERENCE coordinate system (degrees). Required for first item of Control Point Sequence, or if Patient Support Angle changes during Beam.

entry.name: >>Patient Support Rotation Direction
entry.description: Direction of Patient Support Rotation when viewing table from above, for segment following Control Point. Required for first item of Control Point Sequence, or if Patient Support Rotation Direction changes during Beam. See C.8.8.14.8. Enumerated Values: CW = clockwise CC = counter-clockwise NONE = no rotation

entry.name: >>Table Top Eccentric Axis Distance
entry.description: Distance (positive) from the IEC PATIENT SUPPORT vertical axis to the IEC TABLE TOP ECCENTRIC vertical axis (mm).

entry.name: >>Table Top Eccentric Angle
entry.description: Table Top (non-isocentric) angle, i.e. orientation of IEC TABLE TOP ECCENTRIC coordinate system with respect to IEC PATIENT SUPPORT coordinate system (degrees). Required for first item of Control Point Sequence, or if Table Top Eccentric Angle changes during Beam.

entry.name: >>Table Top Eccentric Rotation Direction
entry.description: Direction of Table Top Eccentric Rotation when viewing table from above, for segment following Control Point. Required for first item of Control Point Sequence, or if Table Top Eccentric Rotation Direction changes during Beam. See C.8.8.14.8. Enumerated Values: CW = clockwise CC = counter-clockwise NONE = no rotation

entry.name: >>Table Top Vertical Position
entry.description: Table Top Vertical position in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (mm). Required for first item of Control Point Sequence, or if Table Top Vertical Position changes during Beam. See C.8.8.14.6.

entry.name: >>Table Top Longitudinal Position
entry.description: Table Top Longitudinal position in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (mm). Required for first item of Control Point Sequence, or if Table Top Longitudinal Position changes during Beam. See C.8.8.14.6.

entry.name: >>Table Top Lateral Position
entry.description: Table Top Lateral position in IEC TABLE TOP coordinate system (mm). Required for first item of Control Point Sequence, or if Table Top Lateral Position changes during Beam. See C.8.8.14.6.

entry.name: >>Isocenter Position
entry.description: Isocenter coordinates (x,y,z) in the patient based coordinate system described in C.7.6.2.1.1 (mm). Required for first item of Segment Control Point Sequence, or if Segment Isocenter Position changes during Beam.

entry.name: >>Surface Entry Point
entry.description: Patient surface entry point coordinates (x,y,z) in the patient based coordinate system described in C.7.6.2.1.1 (mm).

entry.name: >>Source to Surface Distance
entry.description: Source to Patient Surface distance (mm).

table.name: RT BRACHY APPLICATION SETUPS MODULE ATTRIBUTES

entry.name: Brachy Treatment Technique
entry.description: Type of brachytherapy treatment technique. Enumerated Values: INTRALUMENARY INTRACAVITARY INTERSTITIAL CONTACT INTRAVASCULAR PERMANENT See C.8.8.15.1.

entry.name: Brachy Treatment Type
entry.description: Type of brachytherapy treatment. Defined Terms: MANUAL = manually positioned HDR = High dose rate MDR = Medium dose rate LDR = Low dose rate PDR = Pulsed dose rate

entry.name: Treatment Machine Sequence
entry.description: Introduces single item sequence describing treatment machine to be used for treatment delivery. Only one item may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >Treatment Machine Name
entry.description: User-defined name identifying treatment machine to be used for treatment delivery.

entry.name: >Manufacturer
entry.description: Manufacturer of the equipment to be used for treatment delivery.

entry.name: >Institution Name
entry.description: Institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for treatment delivery.

entry.name: >Institution Address
entry.description: Mailing address of the institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for treatment delivery.

entry.name: >Institutional Department Name
entry.description: Department in the institution where the equipment is located that is to be used for treatment delivery.

entry.name: >Manufacturer's Model Name
entry.description: Manufacturer's model name of the equipment that is to be used for treatment delivery.

entry.name: >Device Serial Number
entry.description: Manufacturer's serial number of the equipment that is to be used for treatment delivery.

entry.name: Source Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of Sources to be used within Application Setups. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >Source Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Source. The value of Source Number (300A,0212) shall be unique within the RT Plan in which it is created.

entry.name: >Source Type
entry.description: Type of Source. Defined Terms: POINT LINE CYLINDER SPHERE

entry.name: >Source Manufacturer
entry.description: Manufacturer of Source.

entry.name: >Active Source Diameter
entry.description: Diameter of active Source (mm).

entry.name: >Active Source Length
entry.description: Length of active Source (mm).

entry.name: >Material ID
entry.description: User-supplied identifier for encapsulation material of active Source.

entry.name: >Source Encapsulation Nominal Thickness
entry.description: Nominal thickness of wall of encapsulation (mm). See C.8.8.15.12.

entry.name: >Source Encapsulation Nominal Transmission
entry.description: Nominal transmission through wall of encapsulation (between 0 and 1). See C.8.8.15.12

entry.name: >Source Isotope Name
entry.description: Name of Isotope.

entry.name: >Source Isotope Half Life
entry.description: Half-life of Isotope (days).

entry.name: >Source Strength Units
entry.description: Measurement unit of Source Strength. Required if the source is not a gamma-emitting (photon) source. May be present otherwise. Enumerated Values: AIR_KERMA_RATE = Air Kerma Rate if Source is Gamma emitting Isotope. DOSE_RATE_WATER = Dose Rate in Water if Source is Beta emitting Isotope.

entry.name: >Reference Air Kerma Rate
entry.description: Air Kerma Rate in air of Isotope specified at Air Kerma Rate Reference Date (300A,022C) and Air Kerma Rate Reference Time (300A,022E) (in µGy h-1 at 1 m). Value shall be zero for non-gamma sources.

entry.name: >Source Strength
entry.description: Source Strength of Isotope at Source Strength Reference Date (300A,022C) and Source Strength Reference Time (300A,022E), in units specified in Source Strength Units (300A,0229). Required if the source is not a gamma-emitting (photon) source. See C.8.8.15.13.

entry.name: >Source Strength Reference Date
entry.description: Reference date for Reference Air Kerma Rate (300A,022A) or Source Strength (300A,022B) of Isotope.

entry.name: >Source Strength Rate Reference Time
entry.description: Reference time for Air Kerma Rate (300A,022A) or Source Strength (300A,022B) of Isotope.

entry.name: Application Setup Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of Application Setups for current RT Plan. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >Application Setup Type
entry.description: Type of Application Setup. Defined Terms: FLETCHER_SUIT DELCLOS BLOEDORN JOSLIN_FLYNN CHANDIGARH MANCHESTER HENSCHKE NASOPHARYNGEAL OESOPHAGEAL ENDOBRONCHIAL SYED_NEBLETT ENDORECTAL PERINEAL

entry.name: >Application Setup Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Application Setup. The value of Application Setup Number (300A,0234) shall be unique within the RT Plan in which it is created.

entry.name: >Application Setup Name
entry.description: User-defined name for Application Setup.

entry.name: >Application Setup Manufacturer
entry.description: Manufacturer of Application Setup.

entry.name: >Template Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Template. The value of Template Number (300A,0240) shall be unique within the Application Setup in which it is created.

entry.name: >Template Type
entry.description: User-defined type for Template Device.

entry.name: >Template Name
entry.description: User-defined name for Template Device.

entry.name: >Referenced Reference Image Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of reference images used for validation of current Application Setup. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Referenced SOP Class UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Class. Required if Referenced Reference Image Sequence (300C,0042) is sent.

entry.name: >>Referenced SOP Class Instance
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Instance. Required if Referenced Reference Image Sequence (300C,0042) is sent.

entry.name: >Total Reference Air Kerma
entry.description: Total Reference Air Kerma for current Application Setup, i.e. the product of Air Kerma Rate of all Sources in all Channels with their respective Channel Times (µGy at 1 m). Value shall be zero for non-gamma sources.

entry.name: >Brachy Accessory Device Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of Brachy Accessory Devices associated with current Application Setup. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Brachy Accessory Device Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Brachy Accessory Device. The value of Brachy Accessory Device Number (300A,0262) shall be unique within the Application Setup in which it is created. Required if Brachy Accessory Device Sequence (300A,0260) is sent.

entry.name: >>Brachy Accessory Device ID
entry.description: User or machine supplied identifier for Brachy Accessory Device. Required if Brachy Accessory Device Sequence (300A,0260) is sent.

entry.name: >>Brachy Accessory Device Type
entry.description: Type of Brachy Accessory Device. Required if Brachy Accessory Device Sequence (300A,0260) is sent. Defined Terms: SHIELD DILATATION MOLD PLAQUE FLAB

entry.name: >>Brachy Accessory Device Name
entry.description: User-defined name for Brachy Accessory Device.

entry.name: >>Material ID
entry.description: User-supplied identifier for material of Brachy Accessory Device. See Note.

entry.name: >> Brachy Accessory Device Nominal Thickness
entry.description: Nominal thickness of Brachy Accessory Device (mm). See C.8.8.15.12.

entry.name: >> Brachy Accessory Device Nominal Transmission
entry.description: Nominal Transmission through Brachy Accessory Device (between 0 and 1). See C.8.8.15.12.

entry.name: >>Referenced ROI Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies ROI representing the Brachy Accessory specified by ROI Number (3006,0022) in Structure Set ROI Sequence (3006,0020) in Structure Set Module within RT Structure Set referenced by Referenced RT Structure Set Sequence (300C,0060) in RT General Plan Module. Required if Brachy Accessory Device Sequence (300A,0260) is sent. See C.8.8.15.2.

entry.name: >Channel Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of Channels for current Application Setup. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>Channel Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Channel. The value of Channel Number (300A,0282) shall be unique within the Application Setup in which it is created.

entry.name: >>Channel Length
entry.description: Length of Channel (mm). See C.8.8.15.3.

entry.name: >>Channel Total Time
entry.description: Total amount of time between first and final Control Points of the Brachy Control Point Sequence (300A,02D0) for current Channel (sec). Channel Total Time calculation is based upon the Reference Air Kerma Rate (300A,022A) of the Referenced Source Number (300C,000E).

entry.name: >>Source Movement Type
entry.description: Type of Source movement. See C.8.8.15.4. Defined Terms: STEPWISE FIXED OSCILLATING UNIDIRECTIONAL

entry.name: >>Number of Pulses
entry.description: Number of Pulses per fraction for current Channel. Required if Brachy Treatment Type (300A,0202) is PDR.

entry.name: >>Pulse Repetition Interval
entry.description: Pulse repetition interval (sec) for current Channel. Required if Brachy Treatment Type (300A,0202) is PDR.

entry.name: >>Source Applicator Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Source Applicator. The value of Source Applicator Number (300A,0290) shall be unique within the Channel in which it is created.

entry.name: >>Source Applicator ID
entry.description: User or machine supplied identifier for Source Applicator. Required if Source Applicator Number (300A,0290) is sent.

entry.name: >>Source Applicator Type
entry.description: Type of Source Applicator. Required if Source Applicator Number (300A,0290) is sent. Defined Terms: FLEXIBLE RIGID

entry.name: >>Source Applicator Name
entry.description: User-defined name for Source Applicator.

entry.name: >>Source Applicator Length
entry.description: Length of Source Applicator (mm), defined as the distance between the connector of the applicator and the distal-most position of the source. Required if Source Applicator Number (300A,0290) is sent.

entry.name: >>Source Applicator Manufacturer
entry.description: Manufacturer of Source Applicator.

entry.name: >>Material ID
entry.description: User-supplied identifier for material of Source Applicator wall. See Note.

entry.name: >> Source Applicator Wall Nominal Thickness
entry.description: Nominal Thickness of Source Applicator wall (mm). See C.8.8.15.12.

entry.name: >> Source Applicator Wall Nominal Transmission
entry.description: Nominal Transmission through Source Applicator wall (between 0 and 1). See C.8.8.15.12.

entry.name: >>Source Applicator Step Size
entry.description: Distance of path along channel (in mm) between adjacent (potential) dwell positions. Required if Source Movement Type (300A,0288) is STEPWISE.

entry.name: >>Referenced ROI Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies ROI representing the Source Applicator specified by ROI Number (3006,0022) in Structure Set ROI Sequence (3006,0020) in Structure Set Module within RT Structure Set referenced by Referenced RT Structure Set Sequence (300C,0060) in RT General Plan Module. Required if Source Applicator Number (300A,0290) is sent. See C.8.8.15.2.

entry.name: >>Transfer Tube Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Transfer Tube. The value of Transfer Tube Number (300A,02A2) shall be unique within the Channel in which it is created.

entry.name: >>Transfer Tube Length
entry.description: Length of Transfer Tube of current afterloading Channel (mm). Required if value Transfer Tube Number (300A,02A2) is non-null.

entry.name: >>Channel Shield Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of Channel Shields associated with current Channel. One or more items may be included in this sequence. See C.8.8.15.5.

entry.name: >>>Channel Shield Number
entry.description: Identification number of the Channel Shield. The value of Channel Shield Number (300A,02B2) shall be unique within the Channel in which it is created. Required if Channel Shield Sequence (300A,02B0) is sent.

entry.name: >>>Channel Shield ID
entry.description: User or machine supplied identifier for Channel Shield. Required if Channel Shield Sequence (300A,02B0) is sent.

entry.name: >>>Channel Shield Name
entry.description: User-defined name for Channel Shield.

entry.name: >>>Material ID
entry.description: User-supplied identifier for material of Channel Shield. See Note.

entry.name: >>>Channel Shield Nominal Thickness
entry.description: Nominal Thickness of Channel Shield (mm). See C.8.8.15.12.

entry.name: >>>Channel Shield Nominal Transmission
entry.description: Nominal Transmission of Channel Shield (between 0 and 1). See C.8.8.15.12.

entry.name: >>>Referenced ROI Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies ROI representing the Channel Shield specified by ROI Number (3006,0022) in Structure Set ROI Sequence (3006,0020) in Structure Set Module within RT Structure Set referenced by Referenced RT Structure Set Sequence (300C,0060) in RT General Plan Module. Required if Channel Shield Sequence (300A,02B0) is sent. See C.8.8.15.2.

entry.name: >>Referenced Source Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced Source within the Source Sequence (300A,0210) for current Application Setup.

entry.name: >>Number of Control Points
entry.description: Number of control points in Channel. For an N-segment Channel there will be 2N (stepwise movement) or N+1 (continuous movement) control points.

entry.name: >>Final Cumulative Time Weight
entry.description: Value of Cumulative Time Weight (300A,02D6) for final Control Point in Brachy Control Point Sequence (300A,02D0). Required if Cumulative Time Weight (300A,02D6) is non-null in Control Points specified within Brachy Control Point Sequence (300A,02D0). See C.8.8.15.6.

entry.name: >>Brachy Control Point Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of machine configurations describing this Channel. Two or more items may be included in this sequence. See C.8.8.15.7.

entry.name: >>>Control Point Index
entry.description: Index of current Control Point, starting at 0 for first Control Point.

entry.name: >>>Cumulative Time Weight
entry.description: Cumulative time weight to current Control Point (where the weighting is proportional to time values delivered). Cumulative Time Weight for first item in Brachy Control Point Sequence (300A,02D0) is always zero. See C.8.8.15.6 and C.8.8.15.8.

entry.name: >>>Control Point Relative Position
entry.description: Distance between current Control Point Position and the distal-most possible Source position in current Channel (mm). See C.8.8.15.9.

entry.name: >>>Control Point 3D Position
entry.description: Coordinates (x, y, z) of Control Point in the patient based coordinate system described in C.7.6.2.1.1 (mm). See C.8.8.15.10.

entry.name: >>>Brachy Referenced Dose Reference Sequence
entry.description: Introduces a sequence of Dose References for current Channel. One or more items may be included in this sequence.

entry.name: >>>>Referenced Dose Reference Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies Dose Reference described in Dose Reference Sequence. (300A,0010) within RT Prescription Module of current RT Plan. Required if Brachy Referenced Dose Reference Sequence (300C,0055) is sent.

entry.name: >>>>Cumulative Dose Reference Coefficient
entry.description: Coefficient used to calculate cumulative dose contribution from this Source to the referenced Dose Reference at the current Control Point. Required if Brachy Referenced Dose Reference Sequence (300C,0055) is sent. See C.8.8.15.11.

entry.name: Approval Status
entry.description: Approval status at the time the SOP Instance was created. Enumerated Values: APPROVED = Reviewer recorded that object met an implied criterion UNAPPROVED = No review of object has been recorded REJECTED = Reviewer recorded that object failed to meet an implied criterion

entry.name: Review Date
entry.description: Date on which object was reviewed. Required if Approval Status (300E,0002) is APPROVED or REJECTED.

entry.name: Review Time
entry.description: Time at which object was reviewed. Required if Approval Status (300E,0002) is APPROVED or REJECTED.

entry.name: Reviewer Name
entry.description: Name of person who reviewed object. Required if Approval Status (300E,0002) is APPROVED or REJECTED.

table.name: RT GENERAL TREATMENT RECORD MODULE ATTRIBUTES

entry.name: Instance Number
entry.description: Instance number identifying this particular instance of the object.

entry.name: Treatment Date
entry.description: Date when current fraction was delivered, or Date last fraction was delivered in case of RT Treatment Summary Record IOD. See Note.

entry.name: Treatment Time
entry.description: Time when current fraction was delivered (begun), or Time last fraction was delivered (begun) in case of RT Treatment Summary Record IOD. See Note.

entry.name: Referenced RT Plan Sequence
entry.description: A sequence which provides reference to a RT Plan SOP Class/Instance pair. Only a single Item shall be permitted in this Sequence.

entry.name: >Referenced SOP Class UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Class. Required if Referenced RT Plan Sequence (300C,0002) is sent.

entry.name: >Referenced SOP Instance UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Instance. Required if Referenced RT Plan Sequence (300C,0002) is sent.

entry.name: Referenced Treatment Record Sequence
entry.description: A sequence which provides reference to RT Treatment Record SOP Class/Instance pairs to which the current RT Treatment Record is significantly related. The sequence may contain one or more items.

entry.name: >Referenced SOP Class UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Class. Required if Referenced Treatment Record Sequence (3008,0030) is sent.

entry.name: >Referenced SOP Instance UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Instance. Required if Referenced Treatment Record Sequence (3008,0030) is sent.

table.name: RT TREATMENT MACHINE RECORD MODULE ATTRIBUTES

entry.name: Treatment Machine Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence describing treatment machine used for treatment delivery. Only a single Item shall be permitted in this Sequence.

entry.name: >Treatment Machine Name
entry.description: User-defined name identifying treatment machine used for treatment delivery.

entry.name: >Manufacturer
entry.description: Manufacturer of the equipment used for treatment delivery.

entry.name: >Institution Name
entry.description: Institution where the equipment is located that was used for treatment delivery.

entry.name: >Institution Address
entry.description: Mailing address of the institution where the equipment is located that was used for treatment delivery.

entry.name: >Institutional Department Name
entry.description: Department in the institution where the equipment is located that was used for treatment delivery.

entry.name: >Manufacturer's Model Name
entry.description: Manufacturer's model name of the equipment used for treatment delivery.

entry.name: >Device Serial Number
entry.description: Manufacturer's serial number of the equipment used for treatment delivery.

table.name: MEASURED DOSE REFERENCE RECORD MODULE ATTRIBUTES

entry.name: Measured Dose Reference Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of doses measured during treatment delivery, summed over entire session. The sequence may contain one or more items.

entry.name: >Referenced Dose Reference Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies Dose Reference specified by Dose Reference Number (300A,0012) in Dose Reference Sequence (300A,0010) in RT Prescription Module of referenced RT Plan. Required only if Measured Dose Reference Number (3008,0064) is not sent. It shall not be present otherwise.

entry.name: >Measured Dose Reference Number
entry.description: Unique identifier of measured dose point. Required only if Referenced Dose Reference Number (300C,0051) is not sent. It shall not be present otherwise.

entry.name: >Dose Units
entry.description: Units used to describe measured dose. Enumerated Values: GY = Gray RELATIVE = Dose relative to implicit reference value

entry.name: >Measured Dose Value
entry.description: Measured Dose in units specified by Dose Units (3004,0002).

entry.name: >Measured Dose Type
entry.description: Type of dose measurement. Defined Terms: DIODE = semiconductor diode TLD = thermoluminescent dosimeter ION_CHAMBER = ion chamber GEL = dose sensitive gel EPID = electronic portal imaging device FILM = dose sensitive film

entry.name: >Measured Dose Description
entry.description: User-defined description of Dose Reference (e.g. “Exit dose”, “Point A”).

table.name: CALCULATED DOSE REFERENCE RECORD MODULE ATTRIBUTES

entry.name: Calculated Dose Reference Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of doses estimated for each treatment delivery. The sequence may contain one or more items.

entry.name: >Referenced Dose Reference Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies Dose Reference specified by Dose Reference Number (300A,0012) in Dose Reference Sequence (300A,0010) in RT Prescription Module of referenced RT Plan. Required only if Calculated Dose Reference Number (3008,0072) is not sent. It shall not be present otherwise.

entry.name: >Calculated Dose Reference Number
entry.description: Unique identifier of dose reference point within RT Treatment Record IOD. Required only if Referenced Dose Reference Number (300C,0051) is not sent. It shall not be present otherwise.

entry.name: >Calculated Dose Reference Dose Value
entry.description: Calculated Dose (Gy).

entry.name: >Calculated Dose Reference Description
entry.description: User-defined description of Calculated Dose Reference.

table.name: RT BEAMS SESSION RECORD MODULE ATTRIBUTES

entry.name: Operators’ Name
entry.description: Name of operator administering treatment session.

entry.name: Referenced Fraction Group Number
entry.description: Identifier of Fraction Group within referenced RT Plan.

entry.name: Number of Fractions Planned
entry.description: Total number of treatments (Fractions) planned for current Fraction Group.

entry.name: Primary Dosimeter Unit
entry.description: Measurement unit of machine dosimeter. Enumerated Values: MU = Monitor Unit MINUTE = minute

entry.name: Treatment Session Beam Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of Beams administered during treatment session. The sequence may contain one or more items.

entry.name: >Referenced Beam Number
entry.description: References Beam specified by Beam Number (300A,00C0) in Beam Sequence (300A,00B0) in RT Beams Module within referenced RT Plan.

entry.name: >Beam Name
entry.description: User-defined name for delivered Beam.

entry.name: >Beam Description
entry.description: User-defined description for delivered Beam.

entry.name: >Beam Type
entry.description: Motion characteristic of delivered Beam. Enumerated Values: STATIC = all beam parameters remain unchanged during delivery DYNAMIC = one or more beam parameters changes during delivery

entry.name: >Radiation Type
entry.description: Particle type of delivered Beam. Defined Terms: PHOTON, ELECTRON, NEUTRON, PROTON.

entry.name: >High-Dose Technique Type
entry.description: Type of high-dose treatment technique. Defined Terms: NORMAL = Standard treatment TBI = Total Body Irradiation HDR = High Dose Rate Required if treatment technique requires a dose that would normally require overriding of treatment machine safety controls.

entry.name: >Referenced Verification Image Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of verification images obtained during delivery of current beam. The sequence may contain one or more items.

entry.name: >>Referenced SOP Class UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Class. Required if Referenced Verification Image Sequence (300C,0040) is sent.

entry.name: >>Referenced SOP Instance UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Instance. Required if Referenced Verification Image Sequence (300C,0040) is sent.

entry.name: >>Start Meterset
entry.description: Cumulative Meterset Weight within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number at which image acquisition starts.

entry.name: >>End Meterset
entry.description: Cumulative Meterset Weight within Beam referenced by Referenced Beam Number at which image acquisition ends.

entry.name: >Referenced Measured Dose Reference Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of doses measured during treatment delivery for current Beam. The sequence may contain one or more items.

entry.name: >>Referenced Dose Reference Number
entry.description: Uniquely references Dose Reference specified by Dose Reference Number (300A,0012) in Dose Reference Sequence (300A,0010) in RT Prescription Module of referenced RT Plan. Required if Referenced Measured Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0080) is sent and Referenced Measured Dose Reference Number (3008,0082) is not sent. It shall not be present otherwise.

entry.name: >>Referenced Measured Dose Reference Number
entry.description: Uniquely references Measured Dose Reference specified by Measured Dose Reference Number (3008,0064) in Measured Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0010). Required if Referenced Measured Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0080) is sent and Referenced Dose Reference Number (300C,0051) is not sent. It shall not be present otherwise.

entry.name: >>Measured Dose Value
entry.description: Measured Dose in units specified by Dose Units (3004,0002) in sequence referenced by Measured Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0010) or Dose Reference Sequence (300A,0010) in RT Prescription Module of referenced RT Plan as defined above. Required if Referenced Measured Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0080) is sent.

entry.name: >Referenced Calculated Dose Reference Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of doses estimated for each treatment delivery. The sequence may contain one or more items.

entry.name: >>Referenced Dose Reference Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies Dose Reference specified by Dose Reference Number (300A,0012) in Dose Reference Sequence (300A,0010) in RT Prescription Module of referenced RT Plan. Required if Referenced Calculated Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0090) is sent and Referenced Calculated Dose Reference Number (3008,0092) is not sent.

entry.name: >>Referenced Calculated Dose Reference Number
entry.description: Uniquely identifies Calculated Dose Reference specified by Calculated Dose Reference Number (3008,0072) within Calculated Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0070). Required if Referenced Calculated Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0090) is sent and Referenced Dose Reference Number (300C,0051) is not sent.

entry.name: >>Calculated Dose Reference Dose Value
entry.description: Calculated Dose (Gy). Required if Referenced Calculated Dose Reference Sequence (3008,0090) is sent.

entry.name: >Source-Axis Distance
entry.description: Radiation source to gantry rotation axis distance of the equipment that was used for beam delivery (mm).

entry.name: >Beam Limiting Device Leaf Pairs Sequence
entry.description: Introduces sequence of beam limiting device (collimator) jaw or leaf (element) leaf pair values. The sequence may contain one or more items.

entry.name: >>RT Beam Limiting Device Type
entry.description: Type of beam limiting device (collimator).
